attributes.comment:
These fee increases are not a good idea. They make becoming a citizen
prohibitive for low-income persons. People who immigrate to the United States are
more likely to be low-income, but they are hard workers who have earned their
place in our society. Congress must provide funding to the USCIS.
I am myself am a Naturalized Citizen. Since becoming a citizen, I have served in
Americorps twice and have earned a college degree, focusing on American
politics and the American educational system.
This country is already rife with inequality, we do not need to create further
barriers to equal opportunity.
The American people are willing to fund the appropriations that the USCIS needs.
Don't pass on the cost of our policies to poor immigrants who come here looking
for a new home in a better land.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
